website_summaries.verdict: This skirt is a great choice for recreational paddling in relatively mild conditions. Its zippered tunnel lets you open things up if you need to cool down.
pros: Medium-weight nylon pack cloth with waterproof polyurethane coating.Water-resistant zippered tunnel makes it easy to take skirt on and off
Provides access inside boat for cooling or drinks
cons: Water can still pool on the deck of the skirt and drip through the zipper

customer_reviews.title: Fits a WS Tsunami 140 perfectly (with low profile backband), the zipper is a great feature!
customer_reviews.text: This fits my Wilderness Systems Tsunami 140.. BUT I had to replace the Touring seatback with the Phase 3 Airpro Backband. Otherwise, the skirt would pop off when I twisted. It also fit my Dagger Halifax 17 (but was a bit looser, and easier to remove than the Tsunami). I really do like the zipper. I can enter and exit without removing the skirt from the kayak. It is also nicer to have down here in Florida, so when my legs get too hot , can unzip the skirt and air out the cockpit.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Miller

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this Seals Sneak kayak cover hoping to get out enjoy the foliage colors without being wet and cold. I tried it out this past weekend in my Perception Swifty Deluxe 9.5. It was a little tricky trying to attach the front while keeping the back attached as the cockpit on this kayak is long but I was able to do it. The cover kept me completely dry during my day out and made it much more enjoyable. I did not find any issues with water pooling on the cover. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: NH Dave

customer_reviews.title: Pockets!
customer_reviews.text: This skirt has pockets! It is also an easy fit for my kayak. I was able to take it off and readjust while in the water without too much work. And it has an opposable zipper. So I can unzip the bottom to reach down into my kayak without exposing my upper body to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Kelleigh Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Perception Conduit 13 perfectly. The mesh pockets just hold a bottle of water each. The skirt is just a tad too tall for me so sometimes rubs under my armpits but unsnapping suspenders solves that. 2 way zipper very handy to cool off in hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Love the dual zipper
customer_reviews.text: Fits snuggly on my Perception Rhythm and around my upper torso. The dual zipper allows for convenient access to reach down into the cockpit and permits me to leave the skirt on the kayak and step out of it. This is handy since the skirt is a challenge (tight) to fit to the cockpit while wearing it. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Fit properly, great seal, and Comfortable! Rolled my kayak a few times and it never let in more than a few drops around my shirt.
customer_reviews.author: steven a rowe

customer_reviews.title: Great skirt for beginner or recreational kayaking.
customer_reviews.text: I like the zipper and suspenders. I can wear it looser at the waist and open it for ventilation with the zipper. It sheds water well and the adjustable spine that keeps it from collapsing is well designed. Overall, a great sprayskirt for the recreational paddler.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mazurowski

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Made kayaking in rough water safer and more tolerable - particularly cold bodies of water.
customer_reviews.author: DutchJohn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and well made
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and well made, but a very tight fit on my kayak Elie 10. I might change the cord inside to be something one inch or more longer so i can get this on without a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: gracie's mom

customer_reviews.title: Seals Sprayskirts Sneak Nylon Kayak Spray Skirt-1.4 Deck
customer_reviews.text: I do light paddling, nothing extreme, and find this to be good quality for my needs. I think it's a tad on the expensive side in view of what you're actually getting, but then it is the market that sets the price. Amazon is probably the best deal that you can get on this item.
customer_reviews.author: John Dinger

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Exceptional for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Exceptional for the price. I just wish it came in neoprene.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Innes

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised! Went on there web site and got the correct size for my older kayak, perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: C J

customer_reviews.title: Seals Sprayskirt Sneak Nylon Kayak Spray Skirt 7.0 Deck
customer_reviews.text: Spray skirt fits my Wilderness Pungo kayak perfectly. It replaces an old model which wore out and the new design is much better - easier to put on and the yellow escape strap is very visible.
customer_reviews.author: Jean O

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as the more expensive neoprene skirts and you will ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used on several kayak trips without issue. Not as nice as the more expensive neoprene skirts and you will have some leaks if you get in enough spray but overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: This fit my Perception Conduit 12ft perfectly. I stayed ...
customer_reviews.text: This fit my Perception Conduit 12ft perfectly. I stayed dry & warm during a winter kayak trip on a lake in Minnesota.
customer_reviews.author: Bananas

customer_reviews.title: Seals brand is always good
customer_reviews.text: The Seals brand is always good and perhaps even 'best-in-class'. However you should have ordered it two weeks ago if you are going to need it this week.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Johnson

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: This is good quality spray skirt. It stays one while going through large rapids and comes off easily when you go swimming. The two way zipper is nice to be able to get my water bottle out of my cockpit without taking off the skirt. The only draw back it if you go through large rapids and water is sitting on the spray skirt it drips a little through the zipper. Besides that I have not found anything bad about this product. I give it 4 1/2 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt stay sealed!
customer_reviews.text: Sides of skirt don't stay sealed on my diesel kayak. I should have opted for a more expensive brand. Zippers are nice though
customer_reviews.author: Nick S.

customer_reviews.title: dryer - super idea great
customer_reviews.text: Now I can get in my kayak thru the zipper instead of takeing the whole things off - faster, dryer - super idea great quality
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bohner

customer_reviews.title: Best spray skirt
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, I bring it on every kayaking adventure and it's never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Morrey

customer_reviews.title: Nice features and good fit
customer_reviews.text: I tried my spray skirt in the rain and it really worked well. I was able to get into the skirt through the zipper opening as well as use if for cooling. The features are great and the fit on my kayak is very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Jenwa

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Entry is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This skirt is amazing. Having the zipper for easy entry into the cockpit at any time is just plain brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: KayakDC

customer_reviews.title: Good skirt...
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a few paddle trips on the Big South Fork river and it worked well. Www.letsgohikeit.com
customer_reviews.author: Cyclety68

customer_reviews.title: Well made with many features.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used it yet as I am still a little wary about getting stuck in the boat and like an open cockpit. But do carry it in case I get stuck in the rain or really rough conditions. I like the "seak" feature and ti also has nice pockets and stuff. Seems to be well made and should last a long time. Getting a size that fit my new kayak was a breeze with the online fitting feature. Doesn't seem that it would be overly hot. I would recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckbo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable... with convenient access to the cockpit
customer_reviews.text: I've used this skirt 3 times since purchasing it, once on Lake Erie in some pretty rough seas. It kept me dry each time. The zippered access on the tunnel makes it easy to reach inside for my water bottle. It is comfortable as well. I have yet to roll with it but will try that this weekend! All-in-all, a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Greta

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the few extra bucks!
customer_reviews.text: Seals had a chart at their website so sizing was a breeze, I just had to look for my kayak. The spray-skirt was very well made and has two side mesh pockets. The suspenders can be unbuckled and front unzipped so you can get into your kayak while the spray-skirt is in place. The spray-skirt wasn't too difficult to snap in place, and it was well worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Gremlin

customer_reviews.title: Works great in rough water and rain
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Elie kayak just right. Works great in rough water and rain.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Valuable addition to my Kayak
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product. I was just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: How

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last summer for my days on the lake, to be honest it won't keep the water out if i tip but it does do a good job when i stay upright. i do like the zipper so i can pull my water out when i'm taking a break. have had to use the eject once and it worked fine. it also has a side pocket for keys or snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Giggs

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit snug enough on the sides. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit snug enough on the sides. The gaping allows wind and water in. Haven't figured out how to adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed this model of skirt and liked it so much I needed to buy my own.
customer_reviews.author: M Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Seals Sprayskirt Sneak Nylon Spray Skirt 1.7 Deck
customer_reviews.text: Would have rated five stars if it wasn't so hard to stretch to fit Epic 18x. Other than that, it's the best sprayskirt I have ever seen. Like the pockets and zipper opening. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Condon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fit and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this size 4.2 skirt for Perception Swifty kayak, and it also fits a Flex Vertex kayak as well. Skirt is very high quality construction, and does not leak. Forms a great seal around lip of cockpit that won't let go unless you pull the release. It also has a handy zipper entry so you can leave it on your kayak and get in and out very easily, and also gives you easy access to your gear inside the kayak while on the water. It has a strap to tighten the support bar to provide more water deflection if needed, but mine fit great and didn't even need to tighten that strap. Grat product!
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the skirt to fit the Equinox 10. ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the skirt to fit the Equinox 10.4 kayak. This one is maybe half the size actually needed. The size chart on the website is incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Would like it to be snug along the sides of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried it out yet but it seems ok. Would like it to be snug along the sides of the cowling but it is a long size, so...
customer_reviews.author: jeco

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, but zipper a possible point of failure
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good concept, but I returned. Could see the zipper easily becoming a point of failure, then what's the point?
customer_reviews.author: bobcat931

customer_reviews.title: Zipper failure
customer_reviews.text: I've used and enjoyed Seal products over the years, but this one has an insurmountable flaw. The undersized vertical zipper failed rendering an otherwise good spray skirt useless. Contacted the company through its website. So far it has been unresponsive. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Spray skirt
customer_reviews.text: Used skirt for 3 days and 45 miles in river, it was great in all conditions. Kept water out of boats on rapids (except maybe a drip or two as expected with zipper). Could open easily to get to water I kept inside boat. could get in and out of boat leaving skirt on boat. This was real nice on hot days, as it kept the seat covered from the sum heating it up. Used the zippered pockets on top for a couple small things and trash when needed. I didn't use the straps, as with the velco strips on it I had no problem adjusting it to stay up and be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Works well and has excellent futures and design.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Excellent quality and features. Make sure you verify fit when buying.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

product_meta.title: Seals Sneak Zippered Kayak Spray Skirt
product_meta.description:
Zippered Spray Skirt for light to moderate conditions. Excellent quality and made in the USA. Visit Sealsskirts.com for sizing.

FEATURES:

 * Medium-weight coated nylon packcloth
 * Tensioned deck stay
 * Adjustable neoprene chestband with removable suspenders
 * Dual zippered mesh accessory pockets
 * Two-way, water-resistant zipper provides easy access and added comfort
 * Rim grip/safety slip technology
 * Double-stitched and sealed seams (except Camo)
feature_bullets: Double-stitched construction with sealed seams ensures long-lasting wear and water-resistance
Front webbing grab loop with handle assists with entry and fast wet exits
Strong bungee-powered rim grip system secures skirt firmly to cockpit coaming
Midweight nylon packcloth is coated with polyurethane for waterproofness
Mesh deck pockets store small essentials for quick access

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
